snippet: The shortage of fuel was on the minds of thousands of fans at MetLife Stadium on Sunday. Fans described the Giants game as a diversion from the devastation in New Jersey.
abstract: Thousands of fans travel to MetLife stadium for New York Giants home game against Pittsburgh Steelers, seeing it as a diversion from devastation wrought by Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: The shortage of fuel was on the minds of thousands of fans at MetLife Stadium on Sunday. Fans described the Giants game as a diversion from the devastation in New Jersey.

headline.seo: Celebrating an N.F.L. Sunday After Hurricane Sandy
headline.main: Celebrating an N.F.L. Sunday, No Matter What It Took
headline.print_headline: Celebrating an N.F.L. Sunday, No Matter What It Took
